name: Messenger

refinement_effect.refine_one: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 125% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 150% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 175% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
